title: Easement agreements and grants
dataVerified: Property owner, easement holder, property address, legal description, terms
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Easement status (recorded/active). Link to county recorder/parties system (owner and public, may require authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged easements. Domain binding verifies county recorder/parties. Permanent property encumbrance records. Critical for property rights. Utility access verification.
